ABI_BRIDGE: event Init(address sender, uint256 tokenId, uint256 nonce)
function getHash(address _validator, address _sender, uint256 _tokenId, uint256 _nonce) pure returns (bytes32)
function redeemSwap(address _sender, address _receiver, uint256 _tokenId, uint256 _nonce, bytes calldata _signature)
ABI_TOKEN: function balanceOf(address owner) view returns (uint256 balance)
